title: 89/566/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 October 1989 adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in Spain (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 16 October 1989
adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas, within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC, in Spain
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(89/566/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from 1 January 1989 the list of less-favoured areas in Spain, as set out in the Annex to Directive 86/466/EEC, is hereby amended as shown in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 October 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 273, 24. 9. 1986, p. 104.
